metadata.name: Lost Credit Card - Premium Customer
metadata.description: Ananya Sharma reports her Gold credit card as lost and needs it blocked immediately. She also accepts an upgrade offer to Platinum.

callHistory.summary: Customer requested credit limit increase from 2L to 5L. Approved based on excellent payment history.
Customer inquired about reward points balance and redemption options. Explained current offers.
Card declined during international trip. Enabled international transactions and advised about travel notification.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.content: Good morning! Thank you for calling Premium Card Services. My name is Alex. I can see you're calling about your Gold Credit Card ending in 8901. How may I assist you today, Ms. Sharma?

conversation.speaker: customer
conversation.content: Hi Alex. I'm really worried right now. I think I lost my credit card somewhere. I had it this morning but I can't find it anywhere. I need to block it immediately!

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.content: I completely understand your concern, Ms. Sharma. Don't worry, I'll help you secure your account right away. For your protection, I'm going to block your card immediately. This will prevent any unauthorized transactions.

conversation.speaker: customer
conversation.content: Yes, please do that quickly! I'm so worried someone might use it.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.content: I've successfully blocked your Gold Credit Card ending in 8901. Your card is now inactive and cannot be used for any transactions. I can confirm there have been no suspicious transactions on your account in the last 24 hours.

conversation.speaker: customer
conversation.content: Oh thank goodness! That's such a relief. What happens now? Will I get a replacement card?

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.content: Absolutely! As a valued Gold member, I can arrange for a replacement card to be sent to your registered address. We have two delivery options: standard delivery in 5-7 business days, or express delivery within 24-48 hours for a small fee of Rs. 199. Which would you prefer?

conversation.speaker: customer
conversation.content: I'll take the express delivery please. I really need the card soon as I have some important payments coming up.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.content: Perfect! I've initiated express delivery for your replacement Gold Card. It will arrive at your registered address within 24-48 hours. The Rs. 199 fee will be added to your next billing statement.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.content: Ms. Sharma, while I have you on the line, I noticed you've been a loyal Gold member with excellent payment history since 2019. I'd like to offer you a complimentary upgrade to our Platinum Card. It includes higher credit limits, premium airport lounge access, and 2x reward points on all purchases. Would you be interested?

conversation.speaker: customer
conversation.content: Oh that sounds interesting! Is there any additional annual fee for the Platinum card?

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.content: Great question! Since this is a special upgrade offer for valued customers like yourself, the first year's annual fee of Rs. 2,999 is completely waived. From the second year, you can waive the fee by spending Rs. 3 lakhs annually, which I see you typically exceed based on your transaction history.

conversation.speaker: customer
conversation.content: That sounds like a great deal! Yes, please upgrade me to Platinum. Will my replacement card be a Platinum card then?

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.content: Wonderful choice, Ms. Sharma! Yes, your replacement card will now be a Platinum Card with all the premium benefits. I'm processing the upgrade now.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.content: Your upgrade is complete! Your new Platinum Card ending will arrive within 24-48 hours. Your reference number for this call is REF-2024-78234-PC. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

conversation.speaker: customer
conversation.content: No, that's everything. Thank you so much for your quick help, Alex. I really appreciate it!

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.content: You're very welcome, Ms. Sharma! Thank you for being a valued customer. If you have any questions about your new Platinum Card benefits, please don't hesitate to call us. Have a wonderful day!

knowledge.title: Lost/Stolen Card Procedure
knowledge.excerpt: Immediate steps to secure customer account when card is reported lost or stolen.
knowledge.fullContent:
Lost/Stolen Card Procedure

1. IMMEDIATE ACTIONS:
- Block the card immediately in the system
- Verify no unauthorized transactions in last 24-48 hours
- Reassure customer their liability is limited

2. CUSTOMER COMMUNICATION:
- Inform customer the card is now blocked
- Explain replacement card options
- Provide reference number for records

3. REPLACEMENT OPTIONS:
- Standard delivery: 5-7 business days (free)
- Express delivery: 24-48 hours (Rs. 199 for Gold, free for Platinum)

4. FRAUD PROTECTION:
- Zero liability policy for unauthorized transactions
- Report any suspicious activity to fraud team
- Customer will receive SMS alert for all transactions

knowledge.title: Card Delivery Options
knowledge.excerpt: Standard and express delivery options for replacement cards.
knowledge.fullContent:
Card Delivery Options

STANDARD DELIVERY:
- Timeline: 5-7 business days
- Cost: Free for all card tiers
- Tracking: SMS updates provided

EXPRESS DELIVERY:
- Timeline: 24-48 hours
- Cost by tier:
  * Standard: Rs. 299
  * Gold: Rs. 199
  * Platinum: Free
- Tracking: Real-time tracking link provided

ADDRESS VERIFICATION:
- Confirm registered address before dispatch
- Alternate address requires additional verification
- PO Box delivery not available

knowledge.title: Platinum Card Benefits
knowledge.excerpt: Complete list of Platinum tier benefits and features.
knowledge.fullContent:
Platinum Card Benefits

REWARDS:
- 2x reward points on all purchases
- 5x points on travel and dining
- Points never expire

TRAVEL BENEFITS:
- Complimentary airport lounge access (8 visits/year)
- Travel insurance up to Rs. 50 lakhs
- No foreign transaction fees

LIFESTYLE:
- Concierge service 24/7
- Golf privileges at partner courses
- Premium dining discounts

CREDIT FEATURES:
- Higher credit limit (up to Rs. 10 lakhs)
- Lower interest rate (1.49% vs 1.99%)
- Extended interest-free period (50 days)

ANNUAL FEE:
- Rs. 2,999/year
- Waived on Rs. 3 lakh annual spend

complianceRules.message: Please provide the customer with the reference number REF-2024-78234-PC for their records. This is required for all card block and replacement requests.
